summary: A collection of unit tests that verify the behavior and validation logic of various Prefect server schema models, including artifact conversion, block document naming rules, reference handling, flow run notification and policy compatibility, task run cache key limits, task run policy deprecation handling, work pool configuration, and work queue health constraints.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of server-side data models in the Prefect platform, preventing regressions and enforcing data integrity, backward compatibility, and configuration limits for API interactions and internal scheduling components.
